description: Portal 2 is a first person puzzle adventure where you shoot solve test chambers using portal mechanics and other map specific items

0.1.description:
This is a test alpha version of the Portal 2 APWorld and client.
It will be full of bugs and issues and is missing many features including additional locations other than maps, traps, and quality of life features.
This version is only being released so we can test the base functionality of the mod and find any major bugs early on in development.

To install just download the apworld and put it into the custom_worlds folder or double click it to put it there automatically (assuming you have the archipelago launcher installed already).

Please make a list of bugs you encounter while playing and send them in the Portal 2 thread on the discord after your play session so I can go through them.

If you have any issues or suggestions you can do the same on the thread, just remember this is base functionality only so many planned features are not present in this version but will be added in the next versions.
0.1.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.1

0.2.description:
# What Is Added?

- Traps (only 3 at the moment for testing purposes - open to any ideas you have)
- A new map progression system/ randomisation for better player experience
- In game messages for items received and player goals
- Bug fixes from v0.1
- A Steam Icon (does not work in the game's desktop shortcut)

# General Information

This is a test alpha version of the Portal 2 APWorld and client.
It will be full of bugs and issues and is missing many features including additional locations other than maps, traps, and quality of life features.
This version is only being released so we can test the base functionality of the mod and find any major bugs early on in development.

# How to use

To install just download the apworld and put it into the custom_worlds folder or double click it to put it there automatically (assuming you have the archipelago launcher installed already).

# Note

Please make a list of bugs you encounter while playing and send them in the Portal 2 thread on the discord after your play session so I can go through them.

If you have any issues or suggestions you can do the same on the thread, just remember this is base functionality only so many planned features are not present in this version but will be added in the next versions.

Thank you to all of you that tested the last version.

#### Hotfix 1

Fixed some issues that were reported including map checks not going through for 2 levels if dying on them. Portal gun 2 not working on Incinerator, and others
0.2.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.2

0.3.1.description:
Just a couple quick fixes to improve generation and fix logic. See previous release for major updates.

- Added option for increase early sphere maps
- Forced Portal Gun Upgrade into sphere 1 to improved generation success
0.3.1.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.3.1

0.3.2.description: A quick update to make map selection deterministic which should fix the Universal Tracker compatibility and correctly packaged the apworld for this release.
0.3.2.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.3.2

0.3.3.description:
### Patch Notes

- Fixed UT (we hope)
- Removed Bridge from Laser Catcher requirements
- Added custom font to display item hints in subtitles (thanks to LimeDreaming)

> [!NOTE]
> Make sure to update your [Portal 2 Archipelago Mod](https://github.com/GlassToadstool/Portal2ArchipelagoMod/releases/tag/v0.3.3) or the font will not display the correct characters
0.3.3.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.3.3

0.3r2.description:
# What Is Added?

- 2 new fun traps
- New dynamic menu including better required item list in level description
- New /needed level_name for seeing required items for a level
- Fixed logic
- Fixed deathlink toggle command
- Fixed level complete triggers
- Fixed map duplication issues
- New Logo
- New 3 Loading screens

# General Information

This is a working beta of the Portal 2 APWorld and client.
It is in a mostly stable state (notably a couple people crash on the final level) and all core functionality is present.

# How to use

To install just download the apworld and put it into the custom_worlds folder or double click it to put it there automatically (assuming you have the archipelago launcher installed already).

# Note

Please make a list of bugs you encounter while playing and send them in the Portal 2 thread on the discord after your play session so I can go through them.

If you have any issues or suggestions you can do the same on the thread.

Thank you to my beta testers on Sunday for speeding up the dev process so we could get this version out sooner.

# Hotfixed

- Added Button to Chapter 2: Fizzler Intro requirements
0.3r2.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.3

0.4.description:
### Additions
- Optional Wheatley Monitor Break checks for Chapter 8
- Added Portal Gun, Upgraded Portal Gun and PotatOS item pickups as checks
- Added PotatOS to logic
- Improved Turret logic - they can no longer be moved at all by the player

### Notes
You must use the latest (v0.4) version of the [Portal 2 Archipelago Mod](https://github.com/GlassToadstool/Portal2ArchipelagoMod/releases/tag/0.4) with this version of the apworld.

I am 90% sure this will work as intended but due to the amount of additions it does still need further testing so I'd be happy to hear your feedback.
0.4.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.4

0.5.2.description: Quick bug fix, updated gui_enabled to Utils before Archipelago 0.6.7 release. Reverting back to old import
0.5.2.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.5.2

0.5.6.description:
- Fixed item-location count mismatch
- Fixed random location generation
- Added start_inventory_from_pool option

### Note
You must use the latest (v0.5.2) version of the [Portal 2 Archipelago Mod](https://github.com/GlassToadstool/Portal2ArchipelagoMod/releases/tag/0.5.2) with this version of the apworld.
0.5.6.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.5.6

0.5r2.description:
### Additions
- Added ratman dens additional checks
- Added holograms to show missing items and checks
- Blocking buttons for more aesthetic "removal"
    - More to come if feedback is positive
- Made portalgun and potatos checks that are themselves allow continued play
    - before you would have to reload the level to continue
- Added backup item check trigger for blue and upgraded portal gun
    - some people were bypassing the trigger beforehand (which is okay)
- Changed open world logic to account for all levels access and moved it to a game mode option
- Added Chaotic game mode where maps are randomised between chapters as well
- Added option to remove levels from being put into the map pool

### Notes
You must use the latest (v0.5) version of the [Portal 2 Archipelago Mod](https://github.com/GlassToadstool/Portal2ArchipelagoMod/releases/tag/0.5) with this version of the apworld.

There are a lot of additions in this version so there may be some bugs, feel free to report them in the discord :)
0.5r2.title: Portal 2 Archipelago v0.5
